name.baseName: Non-ionic surfactants ; Ethylene oxide, fatty alcohol, nonylphenol, caustic soda, etc.① ; Chemical synthesis (ethoxylation) ; All sizes; NESPS2
非离子表面活性剂 ; 环氧乙烷、脂肪醇、壬基酚、烧碱等① ; 化学合成（乙氧基化） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management86

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management86
technology.technologicalApplicability: 通过乙氧基化工艺合成的非离子表面活性剂，如环氧乙烷、脂肪醇、壬基酚和烧碱等，在包括家用洗涤剂、个人护理产品、农业助剂和纺织加工等多种工业应用中使用。该乙氧基化工艺适用于各种生产规模。尾端处理技术包括物理处理、化学处理和好氧生物处理，用于管理和减少环境污染。这些处理方法有效地处理了非离子表面活性剂生产过程中的废水流，帮助管理了化学需氧量、氨氮、石油相关废物、有机氮化合物、总磷和挥发性有机化合物等污染物。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2681文件，在完整版文件中第3009页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical + chemical + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating hours of wastewater treatment equipment (hours) / annual operating hours of production system (hours)

污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理+化学＋好氧生物处理法，其效率为88，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（污水处理设施的所有耗电设备额定功率（千瓦）×污水处理设施年运行时间（小时/年）），①由于表面活性剂生产中使用的原料品种较多，系数表单中列举了几种常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisSpray tower + activated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management76，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating hours of dust removal equipment (hours) / production system annual production operating hours (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是喷淋塔+活性炭吸附，其效率为76，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=1.0，①由于表面活性剂生产中使用的原料品种较多，系数表单中列举了几种常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物
